title: Online seminars
text:
Steno Diabetes Center Aarhus (SDCA) is launching an online seminar series on diabetes research as part of its internationalization of their research strategy towards the Latin America Region. These online seminars will run over a year with the purpose of knowledge exchange and establishing a network of collaborators with common research interests.










Global diabetes burden. Prevalence, incidence and mortality from type 2 diabetes, type 1 diabetes, and gestational diabetes












Feb 7, 2024
